name: CLOSE FILE
description: This command is used to close both TAS and non-TAS files that have been previously opened using the OPEN or OPENV (Open Variable) command.

parameters.name: filename/@file_number
parameters.description: filename/@file_number - file_expr - Required - The name or number of the file to be closed.

parameters.name: DEL
parameters.description: DEL - Optional - If the file being closed is non-TAS, you can include this option and the program will delete the file from the disk.

comments: If you don’t close the files before the program exits, it will be done automatically. Once a file is closed, its ‘position’ can be used again; i.e., if one is closed another can be opened.
